tweets.text: BREAKING: The 71st Annual ICA Conference will be a hybrid (dual online/in-person) conference #ica21. Click the image to read more: https://t.co/YUzBLM81qf
#ica21 theme ‚Äî so timely and relevant to what is going on in this tumultuous era. @ICA_PRD @icahdq https://t.co/HYtDCTUDOm

The theme for #ica21 is ‚ÄúEngaging the Essential Work of Care: Communication, Connectedness, and Social Justice.‚Äù Click to read the theme Call for Papers: https://t.co/Mb7wfzmXej https://t.co/vo3ixPPRIW

This is great news; way to go, @icahdq! Making #ica21 into a hybrid format is a wonderful decision. I know this will put a lot of extra work on the already hardworking ICA Staff, but the membership appreciates your effort. Thank you! https://t.co/FVGu8WNGQW

As we start to think #ica21, I believe we are defining what conferences might look like in the next decade+: #hybrid.

One thing is certain about the next 10 months: uncertainty!

Three C's define the trajectory:
Covid | Climate | Cuts (in #highered funding).

Let's make it work! https://t.co/iOpEWGKeMF
Important Announcement from ICA HQ regarding #ICA21. #OrgComm https://t.co/vhTcDcko2m
#ica21 planners, you'll be hearing from me today or tomorrow with more details on this prior to our planning meeting next week! Lots to discuss! https://t.co/Xz4r1gIOjC

Here is the #Blueprint for #ica21 ‚¨áÔ∏è

Thanks @icahdq HDQ, @LSawyerED @olivermb and rest of the Executive Committee for great deliberations.

Members: we will be back to hear preferences and share more details as we move along. #ica21 here we comeüí™ https://t.co/iOpEWGKeMF
Comm scholars: ICA theme call is now officially announced. Please do consider submitting your work! #ICA21 #Care https://t.co/MUeU7RoBNB

@claesdevreese @icahdq @LSawyerED @olivermb Really good plan and good to hear about this with plenty of notice! Thanks to all the @icahdq leadership for such careful and considerate planning (plus, I'm psyched about the #ICA21 theme!!)
BIG announcement about #ICA21 https://t.co/a9J5R0diOq

ICA's 2021 conference theme is "Engaging the Essential Work of Care: Communication, Connectedness, and Social Justice." We're excited to release the description of the theme here: https://t.co/wFVscks5h9.

This line alone is enough for making you want to submit your abstract to #ica21, and don't even let me get started on how good the theme is :-) Good job everyone involved in thinking and writing the call. https://t.co/MDYwqfUq8G
What an amazing theme for #ica21 ! https://t.co/F2yJXkSzpf

üîñMy column just out in the July @icahdq newsletter

Looking back at #ica20, looking ahead to #ica21 @olivermb

Also updates on #opencomm (@emrinke), @OSFramework badges, and making our Inclusion, Diversity, Equity and Accessibility a Standing Committee. 

https://t.co/xt0zwenAcZ
The new ICA newsletter is out. Check out the #ica21 theme!  Engaging the Essential Work of Care: Communication, Connectedness, and Social Justice  https://t.co/u7lDInItQ5
Friendly reminder to complete the #ica20 conference survey! Your feedback is very important to us, especially as we begin to prepare for #ica21.
That‚Äôs a wrap! THANK YOU FOR PARTICIPATING! Here‚Äôs hoping we can see you all in person next year in Denver, USA! #ica21 #ica20 https://t.co/byyfYzsSQh

We want to hear from you! If you attended #ica20 check your email for the post-conference survey available thru 29 June, 12:00 Noon EDT. Consider leaving your contact info.; two lucky winners will be randomly selected to win one of two grand prizes! Details in the email.

Do you have the Friday "I don't wanna work" vibes?

We have the perfect productive procrastination solution for you. Take the post-#ica20 conference survey (check your üì´) so that we can evaluate #ica20 and think about #ica21 and beyond.

#TellMeMore https://t.co/kaT0Irqtgs

Hello there #ica20 @icahdq friends: We need your help!

Please take the post-#ica20 conference survey (check your üì´). We need your input. Both evaluating #ica20 and thinking about #ica21 and beyond.

T H A N K   Y O U üôè https://t.co/RPU5G2rTJG
